: : Rodimus Prime : : 
When Nightlight came next to him, Rodimus took his aim off of Perceptor and looked to his girlfriend. The pain she was in was now very apparent on her face. 
Rodimus Prime(whisper): Nightlight, honey, what's the matter? 
 "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote: nIGHTLIGHT::

Nightlight moved nearest Rodimus, she felt that the pain was 
increasing and she didn't know why. She didn't know if she can 
resist more that pain.

their
